subject: Political
title: Ang Tibay vs. CIR (G.R. No. L-46496)
ratio: Administrative due process requires: (1) Right to a hearing, (2) Consideration of evidence, (3) Evidence must be substantial, (4) Decision must have support, (5) Decision must be based on the record, (6) Independent consideration, and (7) Decision must be rendered in such a manner that parties can know the issues.

subject: Political
title: Belgica vs. Ochoa (G.R. No. 208566)
ratio: The Pork Barrel System is unconstitutional as it violates the principle of separation of powers by allowing legislators to intervene in the post-enactment stage of the budget.
